question: What is the objective of input tax credit mechanism under GST?
option1: To provide tax rebate to textile manufacturers
option3: To provide concession to domestic manufacturers of solar panel to give a boost to solar power.
option4: To avoid double burden of taxation
answer: To avoid double burden of taxation
explanation: To ensure there is no double burden of taxation the GST regime has introduced the mechanism of input tax credit. Under the regime of input tax credit the tax payer at the time of paying tax for the output can claim rebate for the tax already paid on the input.
